attributes.action: Award Iraq Medal to those posted to Cyprus at start of war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Award Iraq Medal to those posted to Cyprus at start of war. RAF Akrotiri was one of the busiest stations in the area during the start of Gulf war 2, hundreds of personnel detached from the UK worked tirelessly to support the hundreds of aircraft into and out of theatre including aeromed evacuations of injured soldiers and recieved no recognition for their efforts.
